flavor_text: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed the sound of thunder reverberates.
This ill-tempered Pokemon is dangerous because when it's angry it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
When this ill-tempered Pokemon runs wild it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
